channel.title: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error
channel.description:
I was hoping to fix some frontend stuff and then release this server I have been working on, called RunePlay. But when I tried to log on today I got a "Exception in thread" error. I won't lie I have changed alot of stuff. Also DO NOT post saying sorry you don't know how because I will report you. Only post if you are trying to help. Thankyou.
[code]Starting RunePlay Server on localhost:43594 [RunePlay]: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:51860 Connected from a low memory client. ClientID: Moparscape Client Ramon is signing onto RunePlay Server. Using Name: "Ramon" Using Password: "12345" Ramon: character file not found. Loaded Weather Id: 3 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at ServerCore.process(ServerCore.java:15737) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:125) at ClientListener.main(ClientListener.java:40)[/code]
It would be greatly appriciated if this error was fixed thankyou.
~Zandia

item.title: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error
item.dc:creator: @J_Bird J Bird
item.description:
@J_Bird wrote:

Your globalmessage cant not say anything. Add a message inbetween the “”.

if (globalMessage.length() > 0) {
com.sendMessage(globalMessage);
globalMessage = “”;

Read full topic
item.source: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error

item.title: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Globalmessage is null.

If you have Globalmessage = null anywhere, change it to globalmessage = “”;

Read full topic

item.title: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

Process method in ServerCore.java on line 15737.

NullPointerException is thrown when something tries to use NULL where an object is supposed to be used.

Read full topic
item.source: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error

item.title: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

On another topic

Lol obviously. Yes but I did alot of updating before compiling so i’m not sure where I went wrong.

LOL okay, the best thing to do is copy java that you have edited on recently,
then try deleting the things that you coded recently. And just to tell you,
I mostly get it from my npcdrops.java and the 100 errors on client.java.
So try c+p the notepads that u edited on

Read full topic

item.title: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

It might be a new code that you put on in a certain notepad.
you would have to find the code to make the server work again.

Read full topic

Its something you’ve recently edited, you have to fix that bug, or else you will keep getting that error.

item.title: Having Trouble With "Exception in thread" Error
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

I have had the EXACT same problem today, I was trying out my server which I have yesterday when i got that error.I used a different code for the runserver E.X:Right click on Runserver>Edit>C+P your new code.
Hope that helped!

EDIT:::I have also had that error when messing around with prayer and the icons if that would be the problem.

Read full topic
